name: Derp-sansa
body:
Hi Guys!

> I just found this great resource wondering on the web.
> I give it some more edits and now it's ready for use.

> Full css3 animated images, used as a background image.
> Will post here some demo links soon.

We will create a **CSS3-only** fullscreen background image slideshow. Weâ€™ll create different image transitions and also make a title appear using CSS animations.
The images are by Mark Sebastian and they are licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 Generic License.

Note that this will only work in browsers supporting CSS animations
